Installation¶

Installation is fairly straight forward. It boils down to 3 steps.

  1. Download the source.
  2. Add it to INSTALLED_APPS
  3. Use it.

Download the source¶

To get the source, you can find it on github. I would suggest installing it with pip. That looks more or less like..

pip install -e git+http://github.com/justinlilly/django-gencal.git#egg=django_gencal

Add it to INSTALLED_APPS¶

Fairly straight-forward as well.

INSTALLED_APPS = (
  ...
  'gencal',
  ...
)

Use it¶

As for use, check out the rest of the Gencal Template Tag documentation.
